title: Regal Delicacy
summaries: The Regal Delicacy is a pet-summoning item which is dropped by Queen Slime in Master Mode with a 1/4 (25%) chance. It summons a pet Slime Princess which follows the player around. The pet resembles a miniature Queen Slime with blush, small dotted eyes and a pinpoint mouth.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a Slime Princess
'A dessert fit for a queen!'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
